subject: Productivity
title: How Rewards Lock Habits In
description: A quick, practical guide to How Rewards Lock Habits In.

hook.text: Rats press a lever for sugar water. Humans scroll feeds for likes. Same brain mechanism.

buildup.text: Rewards teach the brain which loops to repeat. Without a payoff, the loop breaks down.

discovery.text: Dopamine spikes not when you get the reward but when you expect it. Craving fuels the loop.

twist.text: Variable rewards create the strongest hooks. Slot machines use this â€” so does social media.

climax.text: To build a good habit, attach a clear reward. To break a bad one, dull the payoff.

punchline.text: The brain chases payoffs. Make good ones easy.

quiz.question: When does dopamine spike in the habit loop?
